Uses of Class
com.dhemery.configuring.ConfigurationBuilder

Packages that use ConfigurationBuilder
com.dhemery.configuring Translate configuration options to and from various representations. 
 

Uses of ConfigurationBuilder in com.dhemery.configuring
 

Methods in com.dhemery.configuring that return ConfigurationBuilder
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.applying(UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
          Append the operators to the list of operators that the configuration will apply whenever an option is queried.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.backedBy(Map<String,String> map)
          Set the given map as the backing store for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.backedBy(Properties properties)
          Set the given properties as the backing store for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.backedBy(StringDictionary dictionary)
          Set the given Dictioanry as the backing store for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.named(String name)
          Set the name for the configuration.
static ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.newConfiguration()
          Create a builder to build a new configuration backed by an empty map and with an empty list of operators.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFrom(Map<String,String> map)
          Merge map entries into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFrom(Properties properties)
          Merge properties into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFrom(StringDictionary dictionary)
          Merge options into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFromPropertiesFile(String fileName)
          Merge properties from the named file into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFromPropertiesFiles(String... fileNames)
          Merge properties from the named files into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFromPropertiesResource(String resourceName)
          Merge properties from the named resource into the overrides for the configuration.
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOptionsFromPropertiesResources(String... resourceNames)
          Merge properties from the named resources into the overrides for the configuration.
